text: I'd work with customers who have made
large scale migrations from on-prem
MongoDB into ec2 or they're still
running MongoDB they're running an ec2
but even then the cost is still killing
it so they come to me they say how can I
move all this stuff into DynamoDB
looking at a fully managed service that
provides a no SQL database is pretty
pretty attractive there's this nice tool
called dynamic dynamodb which kind of
monitors your capacity usage and adjusts
your capacity for you then was again we
want to really emphasize this point the
reason we use is that's easy easy to use
in scale one of the biggest value points
we have fast and consistent at any scale
we have customers that are doing
millions of transactions per second
billions of transactions per day and
seeing exactly that
